description: Explore the expanding horizons of NFT utility beyond digital collectibles, delving into their applications across gaming, music, real estate, and more. Learn how NFTs are reshaping industries by providing secure ownership and transformative experiences.
keywords: NFTs, Non-Fungible Tokens, digital collectibles, blockchain, digital art, gaming, music, real estate, identity, fractional ownership, environmental solutions, blockchain technology
title: Expanding Horizons of NFT Utility
